title: The Last Days Of Winter Les Derniers Jours De L'hiver 2012 Bande Annonce

sources.title: The Last Days Of Winter Les Derniers Jours De L'hiver 2012 Bande Annonce
sources.description: Crew: Written and Directed by: Mehrdad Oskouei Director of Photography: Ashkan Ashkani Editing: Farid Daghagheleh Music: Morteza Saedi Sound Recorder: Hadi Saed Mohkam Sound Mixer: Hossein Mahdavi Director’s consultant: Babak Karimi Producer: Mehrdad Oskouei Production Company: Oskouei Film Production Production Country: Iran Year: 2011 Running Time: 52min Shooting format: HDV; colour Screening format: HD CAM, Digibeta Sound: Mono Ratio: 16/9 Original version: Persian Subtitled in: English or French Synopsis: The last few days of winter and Tehran prepares for the Iranian New Year. The camera follows the lives of 7 teenagers, inmates in a children’s correctional unit. We share their thoughts about what brought them there and the means of escape from a cruel destiny.
